title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 46.3 - Petition for spreading items
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 46.3 - Petition for spreading items

State Regulations

Applications for spreading revenue, expense or income
items shall state whether they relate primarily to past or future operations
and the relation of each such item to: (a) the normal monthly balance in the
particular account in which it is includible; and
(b) the normal monthly total of the balances
of the group of revenue, expense or income accounts within which such account
falls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
46.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
